O

onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginViewController
Closes database connection and closes the program.
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginViewController
Login button to validate user in DB.
When Login button is clicked, textfields are checked to see if they are blank.
onButtonCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerViewController
Sends the user back to the main menu without creating a customer.
onButtonExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
Closes database connection and closes the program.
onButtonReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainViewController
Changes to the reports view.
onButtonSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerViewController
Either INSERTs or UPDATEs a customer into the customers table in the database.
Checks if any field is blank with InputValidation and alerts user if there is a blank field.
onCBCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerViewController
Filters the division list to only have locations that match the selected country (LAMBDA TO REDUCE LoC).
onCBCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportViewController
Creates a filtered division list to display in the table view based on country selected in combo box and displays number of entries (USES LAMBDA FOR FEWER LoC).
openConnection() - Static method in class utils.JDBC
Opens the database connection.
